note: KC, Arbitrator and Mediator. Specialist in international (public and private) and domestic disputes in the commercial, energy and projects/infrastructure sectors. Acts for governments; NGO's; corporations and individuals. GBR Representative to the FIS Legal Committee. Acted as selector/judge 2010; 2018 and 2022 Winter Olympics. Skis; climbs; dives; hikes and fences. Since the pandemic also cooks and lives off the grid in the remote NW Highlands. Writes the occasional book or article.
